metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3970 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A vulnerability was found in LibTIFF. It has been classified as critical.This affects the function TIFFReadRGBATileExt of the filelibtiff/tif_getimage.c. The manipulation leads to integer overflow. It ispossible to initiate the attack remotely. The exploit has been disclosed tothe public and may be used. The name of the patch is227500897dfb07fb7d27f7aa570050e62617e3be. It is recommended to apply apatch to fix this issue. The identifier VDB-213549 was assigned to thisvulnerability.

criterions.comment: tiff: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
